definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Then we Can achieve a fulfillment that no other living creature will ever know.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我們就能取得別的生物所不能取得的滿足感。

sentences.english: Nowadays people look to technology as an alternative source of satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 現在人們指望科技能成爲滿足感的另一個來源。

sentences.english: Fairtrade gives the buyers the satisfaction of helping those who need it most.
sentences.chinese: 而公平貿易能讓購買者獲得幫助最需要的人的滿足感。

sentences.english: Of course, the ideal position is to have money and satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 當然，理想的情況是高薪與滿足感兼得。

sentences.english: An ISFP may find great satisfaction from volunteering as a counselor .
sentences.chinese: 在自願充當顧問時，ISFP會得到極大的滿足感。

sentences.english: Man is a social animal. He finds his fulfillment in association with others.
sentences.chinese: 人是社會性動物，在與他人的交往中尋找滿足感。

sentences.english: I want the satisfaction of 1) squishing this bug myself.
sentences.chinese: 我要自己享受壓扁這隻蟲子的滿足感。

sentences.english: That might give you the satisfaction of doing things the really old-n-geeky way.
sentences.chinese: 那可能給你有老極客作風的滿足感。

sentences.english: Her voice was spitefully rich with satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 她的聲音裏面充滿了惡意的滿足感。

sentences.english: Non-dieters pay more attention to their level of satiety , or fullness.
sentences.chinese: 非節食者則較留意他們的飽足感或滿足感。

sentences.english: Are you thinking scrumptious and satisfying? Or unhealthy and extravagant?
sentences.chinese: 是美味的滿足感，還是不健康和放任自己？

sentences.english: Soon you feel the satisfaction of understanding another language.
sentences.chinese: 很快你就會體會到懂另一門語言的滿足感。

sentences.english: I want the satisfaction of 1 squishing this a myself.
sentences.chinese: 我要自己享受壓扁這隻蟲子的滿足感。

sentences.english: Thay always keep feeling of satisfaction, no matter the case around is so bad.
sentences.chinese: 無論情況有多糟糕，他們總保持着一種滿足感。

sentences.english: In the new work environment. You can show your strengths, to obtain satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 在新的工作環境中，你可以發揮所長，獲得滿足感。

sentences.english: Her mother's presence gave the girl a sense of restfulness and content.
sentences.chinese: 母親的在場使這個小女孩有了寧靜和滿足感。

definition: to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
